import React,{Fragment, useState} from "react"; const Register=()=>{ const [fromData, setFormData]=useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'', password2:'' }); const {name, email, password, password2}=formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]: e.target.value}); return

onChange(e)} name="name" required />
This site uses Gravatar so if you want a profile image, use a Gravatar email

; }; export default Register;
